about_the_game:
EMBRACE THE DARKNESS WITH SUCCUBUS: TORMENTRESS DLC




Fulfill Your Darkest Desires as the Tormentress.

Did you miss us? Like Hell, you did! So get ready to step into the abyss with the Succubus: Tormentress DLC! Unleash the twisted power of the Tormentress, a sinister incarnation of lust and pain, as you revel in the depths of depravity and domination.

SUCCUBUS: TORMENTRESS DLC - FEATURES:

  • On your knees and admire new BDSM skins! Each equipped with unique powers like ability to summon meteors or explode heads.
  • Take a nasty selfie pose with twisted new expressions!
  • Watch hot like a Hell new erotic
  • Try new main hub customization: Temple of Torment!
  • Dance macabre in a new fighting arena
  • Feel the power with new deadly whip weapon in your hand!


EVOKE TORMENT WITH NEW SKINS


Are you ready to dive into the darkness with the brand new BDSM skin inspired by the chilling world of Tormentor. Embrace the macabre with horned adornments that reflect your diabolical nature. These new skins embody the essence of darkness and domination like never before.

Each skin has unique powers that can dominate the realm of hell.

BDSM Skin:

  • Unleash a bloody fireball upon your enemies.
  • Teleport and unleash a devastating wave push.
  • Summon a demonic puppy minion to aid you in battle.
  • Rain down meteors upon your foes.
Latex Skin:

  • Slow down time with a powerful wave push.
  • Detonate explosive heads to obliterate your adversaries.
  • Unleash a devastating wave push to clear the battlefield.
  • Call forth meteors to rain destruction upon your enemies.

MORE SEXY WITH NEW SELFIE POSES


Capture your dark side with a new set of selfie poses inspired by Tormentor's brutal aesthetic. Pose like a devil and demonstrate your mastery of the infernal realm.

IMMERSE YOURSELF IN TWISTED INTERACTIONS


Transform your central hub into a temple of Torment inspired by our upcoming game – Tormentor. Explore new twisted interactions that reflect the darkness within your soul as you navigate the depths of your depravity.

NEW EROTIC ENCOUNTERS – THIS IS WHAT YOU WANT!


Check out the new hot sex scene with the Tormentor! Explore the full range of pleasure and pain and scream delightfully along with your mistress! Finally, someone worthy of the Succubus blood and bed!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR MAIN HUB IN TORMENTOR STYLE


Immerse yourself in the chilling atmosphere of Tormentor and shape your domain to suit your darkest fantasies. Redesign your main hub in the style of Tormentor's temple to get a taste of the vibe of our up-and-coming game.

TEST YOUR SKILLS IN NEW ARENAS OF CHAOS


Confront waves of enemies in a new arena, where the boundaries between pain and pleasure blur into a symphony of carnage. Use the new weapon to unleash torment on your enemies with unparalleled brutality!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains extreme violence, explicit sex scenes - including homosexual ones, BDSM-inspired costumes, vulgar and offensive language, sexual violence, nudity, gore scenes, visible genitalia, and penetration scenes.

name: Succubus - Tormentress

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 /11
  • Processor: i5-6500, Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050, RX 460 (or equivalent with at least 4GB of memory)
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: i5-8600, Ryzen 5 3400G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060, RX 5700 (with at least 6GB of memory)

short_description: Descend into darkness with the Succubus: Tormentress DLC. Embrace new skins, poses, and interactions inspired by Tormentor – our next ultra-brutal game. Customize your hub, indulge in erotic encounters, and wield the deadly whip in brutal arenas. Surrender to your darkest desires now.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Traditional Chinese, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support
